correspondence.message: I am a Master's student in Data Engineering and Analytics. I have fulfilled the credit requirements and have a question about my upcoming semesters. If I cannot complete my master's thesis in Winter 24, will I have a 7th semester to finish it?

You can indeed finish your studies in your 9th semester if you have had two corona prolongations and had 90 ECTS after your 7th semester. More information can be found at cit.tum.de/en/cit/tips-informatics.
